item.title: Sharge’s Loomos AI smart glasses hits $1.5M in 5 days on Kickstarter
item.description: Sharge, a wireless charging supplier, has raised $1.53 million for the Kickstarter launch of its Loomos AI Glasses in just a five days.

item.description: Critics of OpenAI would say it's more empty hype designed to continue placating OpenAI's big-pocketed investors. But I'm not so sure.

item.description: Anthropic uncovers AI's true workforce impact: 57% augmentation vs 43% automation across industries, based on 4 million Claude interactions.

item.title: Humana’s stock falls as loss widens and guidance lags estimates
